Rulings.Edison:
●Revealing “Iron Core of Koa’ki Meiru” and discarding 1 “Koa’ki Meiru” monster are both costs.
●If your hand is being revealed by the effect of “Respect Play” or “Ceremonial Bell” you can't activate this card.
